title: Longfellow House Washington's Headquarters National Historic Site: Work With Us
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Work With Us            Work With Us       Teen Employment Working at a historic site has a lot of benefits, including being paid! Depending on the position you apply for your work can range from maintaining historical grounds and facilities, to interacting with local to international people, to developing ways to engage your peers in the National Park Service. These positions are open to teens, ages 15-18. To learn more about employment opportunities follow the link to our detailed webpage.
